Reference publication

Hogle SL, Thrash JC, Dupont CL, Barbeau KA. (2016). Trace metal acquisition by heterotrophic bacterioplankton with contrasting trophic strategies. Appl. Environ. Microbiol. 82(5): XX-XX LINK

You can download the datasets used in these analyses from here or here.

Python implementation of the protein identification pipeline used in the paper

  • 1. Make rpsblast databases
  • 2. rpsblast search - tab output
  • 3. Parse rpsblast tab output for top hits
  • 4. rpsblast top hits against NCBI CDD
  • 5. Parse xml rpsblast output to reduced form
  • 6. Parse and convert to wide tabular format

Multivariate statistical analyses from the paper (in R)

  • Fisher’s exact test for genome neighborhood enrichment
  • Ordination of genomes based on transporter abundance and diversity
  • Correlation analysis between transporters and genome features
